public class LookupTable
extends DestructibleObject

Represents a LookupTable used in the BandInfo object

Constructor Detail

LookupTable

public LookupTable(int numTables,
                   int numEntries,
                   byte[] lutData)
            throws NITFException
Creates a new LookupTable

Parameters:
numTables - the number of tables
numEntries - the number of entries per table
lutData - the actual LUT data, whose size should be (numTables * numEntries)
Throws:
NITFException
